      • performEndOfDayProcedure

        public void performEndOfDayProcedure(IConnectionPoint cp,
                                     String clearingCondition)
        Description copied from interface: IEndOfDayPerformer
        Perform end of day procedure. The end of day procedure can be triggered from the command line, scheduled using the Scheduler or invoked programmatically by calling this method.
        Specified by:
        performEndOfDayProcedure in interface IEndOfDayPerformer
        Parameters:
        cp - The connection point upon which to perform the procedure (only used by multi-connection point components).
        clearingCondition - A component-specific string to be interpreted by the executor.
